item.text: After this Jesus went away to the other side of the Sea of Galilee (also called the Sea of Tiberias).

A <st data-num="4183" class="">large</st> <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st> was <st data-num="190" class="">following</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> they were <st data-num="2334" class="">observing</st> the <st data-num="4592">miraculous signs</st> he was <st data-num="4160" class="">performing</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="770" class="">sick</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="424">went on up</st> the <st data-num="3735" class="">mountainside</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2521">sat down</st> <st data-num="1563" class="">there</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st>.

(<st data-num="1161">Now</st> the <st data-num="2453" class="">Jewish</st> <st data-num="1859" class="">Feast</st> of the <st data-num="3957" class="">Passover</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="1451">near</st>.)<n id="2" />

<st data-num="3767" class="">Then</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>, when he <st data-num="1869">looked up</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2300" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="3754">that</st> a <st data-num="4183" class="">large</st> <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st> was <st data-num="2064" class="">coming</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="5376" class="">Philip</st>, “<st data-num="4159" class="">Where</st> can we <st data-num="59" class="">buy</st> <st data-num="740" class="">bread</st> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> <st data-num="3778">these people</st> may <st data-num="2068">eat</st>?”

(<st data-num="1161">Now</st> Jesus<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> to <st data-num="3985" class="">test</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> <st data-num="846">he</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">knew</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> he was <st data-num="3195" class="">going</st> to <st data-num="4160">do</st>.)<n id="2" />

<st data-num="5376" class="">Philip</st> <st data-num="611" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="1250">200</st> <st data-num="1220">silver coins</st> worth<n id="2" /> of <st data-num="740" class="">bread</st> would <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="714" class="">be enough</st> for <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, <st data-num="2443" class="">for</st> <st data-num="1538">each one</st> to <st data-num="2983" class="">get</st> a <st data-num="1024" class="">little</st>.”

<st data-num="1520" class="">One</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">Jesus’</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="406" class="">Andrew</st>, <st data-num="4613" class="">Simon</st> <st data-num="4074">Peter’s</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brother</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,
“Here is a boy who has five barley loaves and two fish, but what good are these for so many people?”
Jesus said, “Have the people sit down.” (Now there was a lot of grass in that place.) So the men sat down, about 5,000 in number.

<st data-num="3767" class="">Then</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="2983" class="">took</st> the <st data-num="740" class="">loaves</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> when he had <st data-num="2168">given thanks</st>, he <st data-num="1239" class="">distributed</st> the bread to those who were <st data-num="345" class="">seated</st>. He <st data-num="2532" class="">then</st> did the <st data-num="3668" class="">same</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="3795" class="">fish</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3745">as much as</st> they <st data-num="2309">wanted</st>.

<st data-num="5613" class="">When</st> they were all <st data-num="1705" class="">satisfied</st>, Jesus<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st>, “<st data-num="4863">Gather up</st> the <st data-num="2801">broken pieces</st> that are <st data-num="4052">left over</st>, <st data-num="2443">so that</st> <st data-num="3361 5100">nothing</st> is <st data-num="622" class="">wasted</st>.”
So they gathered them up and filled 12 baskets with broken pieces from the five barley loaves left over by the people who had eaten.
Now when the people saw the miraculous sign that Jesus performed, they began to say to one another, “This is certainly the Prophet who is to come into the world.”
Then Jesus, because he knew they were going to come and seize him by force to make him king, withdrew again up the mountainside alone.
Now when evening came, his disciples went down to the lake,

<st data-num="1684">got into</st> a <st data-num="4143">boat</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">started</st> to <st data-num="4008" class="">cross</st> the <st data-num="2281" class="">lake</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2584">Capernaum</st>.<n id="3" /> (It had <st data-num="2235" class="">already</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">become</st> <st data-num="4653" class="">dark</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> had <st data-num="3768">not yet</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them.)</st><n id="4" />

<st data-num="5037">By now</st> a <st data-num="3173" class="">strong</st> <st data-num="417" class="">wind</st> was <st data-num="4154" class="">blowing</st> and the <st data-num="2281" class="">sea</st> was <st data-num="1326">getting rough</st>.

<st data-num="3767" class="">Then</st>, when they had <st data-num="1643" class="">rowed</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">about</st> <st data-num="1501 4002">three</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="5144">four</st> <st data-num="4712" class="">miles</st>,<n id="1" /> they <st data-num="2334">caught sight</st> of <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="4043" class="">walking</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="2281" class="">lake</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1451 1096">approaching</st> the <st data-num="4143" class="">boat</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they were <st data-num="5399" class="">frightened</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> he <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “It <st data-num="1510">is</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st>. Do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="5399" class="">afraid</st>.”
Then they wanted to take him into the boat, and immediately the boat came to the land where they had been heading.

The next day the crowd that remained on the other side of the lake realized that only one small boat had been there, and that Jesus had not boarded it with his disciples, but that his disciples had gone away alone.

<st data-num="243">Other</st> <st data-num="4143" class="">boats</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="5085" class="">Tiberias</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2064">came</st> to shore<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1451" class="">near</st> the <st data-num="5117" class="">place</st> <st data-num="3699" class="">where</st> they had <st data-num="2068">eaten</st> the <st data-num="740" class="">bread</st> after the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> had <st data-num="2168">given thanks</st>.<n id="3" />
So when the crowd realized that neither Jesus nor his disciples were there, they got into the boats and came to Capernaum looking for Jesus.
When they found him on the other side of the lake, they said to him, “Rabbi, when did you get here?”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="611" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="281" class="">solemn</st> <st data-num="281" class="">truth</st>,<n id="2" /> you are <st data-num="2212">looking for</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> you <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="4592">miraculous signs</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> you <st data-num="2068">ate</st> all the <st data-num="740">loaves of bread</st> you <st data-num="5526" class="">wanted</st>.<n id="3" />
Do not work for the food that disappears, but for the food that remains to eternal life—the food which the Son of Man will give to you. For God the Father has put his seal of approval on him.”
So then they said to him, “What must we do to accomplish the deeds God requires?”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="611" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="3778">This</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="2041" class="">deed</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> requires<n id="3" />—<st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="1565">one</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> he<n id="4" /> <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st>.”

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> they <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="3767">Then</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> <st data-num="4592">miraculous sign</st> will <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">perform</st>, <st data-num="2443">so that</st> we may <st data-num="1492" class="">see</st> it <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>? <st data-num="5101" class="">What</st> will you <st data-num="2038" class="">do</st>?
Our ancestors ate the manna in the wilderness, just as it is written, ‘He gave them bread from heaven to eat.’”
Then Jesus told them, “I tell you the solemn truth, it is not Moses who has given you the bread from heaven, but my Father is giving you the true bread from heaven.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> the <st data-num="740" class="">bread</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the one who<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2597">comes down</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">gives</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st> to the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>.”
So they said to him, “Sir, give us this bread all the time!”
Jesus said to them, “I am the bread of life. The one who comes to me will never go hungry, and the one who believes in me will never be thirsty.

<st data-num="235" class="">But</st> I <st data-num="3004">told</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> you have <st data-num="3708" class="">seen</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> still do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st>.

<st data-num="3956" class="">Everyone</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">gives</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> will <st data-num="2240" class="">come</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the one who <st data-num="2064" class="">comes</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> I will <st data-num="3364">never</st> <st data-num="1544" class="">send</st> <st data-num="1854" class="">away</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="3754" class="">For</st> I have <st data-num="2597">come down</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="1699">my own</st> <st data-num="2307" class="">will</st> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> the <st data-num="2307" class="">will</st> of the one who <st data-num="3992" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">Now</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="2307" class="">will</st> of the one who <st data-num="3992" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>—<st data-num="2443" class="">that</st> I should <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="622" class="">lose</st> one person <st data-num="1537">of</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> <st data-num="3739">one</st> he has <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="450" class="">raise</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> all <st data-num="450" class="">up</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="2078" class="">last</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st>.
For this is the will of my Father—for everyone who looks on the Son and believes in him to have eternal life, and I will raise him up at the last day.”
Then the Jews who were hostile to Jesus began complaining about him because he said, “I am the bread that came down from heaven,”

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="3756 1510">Isn’t</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="2501" class="">Joseph</st>, <st data-num="3739" class="">whose</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">father</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3384" class="">mother</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st>? <st data-num="4459" class="">How</st> can he <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st>, ‘I have <st data-num="2597">come down</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven’</st>?”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="611" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “Do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1111" class="">complain</st> about me <st data-num="3326" class="">to</st> <st data-num="240">one another</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="3762">No one</st> <st data-num="1410" class="">can</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="3362">unless</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> who <st data-num="3992" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="1670" class="">draws</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2504">and I</st> will <st data-num="450" class="">raise</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="450" class="">up</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="2078" class="">last</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st>.
It is written in the prophets, ‘And they will all be taught by God.’ Everyone who hears and learns from the Father comes to me.

(<st data-num="3756">Not</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st> has <st data-num="3708" class="">seen</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> <st data-num="1508">except</st> the one who <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>—<st data-num="3778" class="">he</st><n id="1" /> has <st data-num="3708" class="">seen</st> the <st data-num="3962">Father</st>.)<n id="2" />

I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="281">solemn</st> <st data-num="281">truth</st>,<n id="1" /> the one who <st data-num="4100" class="">believes</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2192" class="">has</st> <st data-num="166" class="">eternal</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st>.<n id="3" />
<st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> the <st data-num="740" class="">bread</st> of <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="4771" class="">Your</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">ancestors</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2068">ate</st> the <st data-num="3131" class="">manna</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2048" class="">wilderness</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they <st data-num="599" class="">died</st>.

<st data-num="3778" class="">This</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="740" class="">bread</st> that has <st data-num="2597">come down</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st>, <st data-num="2443">so that</st> a <st data-num="5100" class="">person</st><n id="2" /> may <st data-num="2068">eat</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="599" class="">die</st>.
I am the living bread that came down from heaven. If anyone eats from this bread he will live forever. The bread that I will give for the life of the world is my flesh.”
Then the Jews who were hostile to Jesus began to argue with one another, “How can this man give us his flesh to eat?”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="281" class="">solemn</st> <st data-num="281" class="">truth</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3362">unless</st> you <st data-num="2068">eat</st> the <st data-num="4561" class="">flesh</st> of the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="444" class="">Man</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4095" class="">drink</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st>,<n id="2" /> you <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">yourselves</st>.

The one who <st data-num="5176" class="">eats</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="4561" class="">flesh</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4095" class="">drinks</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">has</st> <st data-num="166" class="">eternal</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st>, <st data-num="2504">and I</st> will <st data-num="450" class="">raise</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="450" class="">up</st> on the <st data-num="2078" class="">last</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="4561" class="">flesh</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="227" class="">true</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1035" class="">food</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="227" class="">true</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4213" class="">drink</st>.

The one who <st data-num="5176" class="">eats</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="4561" class="">flesh</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4095" class="">drinks</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st> <st data-num="3306" class="">resides</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, <st data-num="2504">and I</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="2531" class="">Just as</st> the <st data-num="2198" class="">living</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, <st data-num="2504">and I</st> <st data-num="2198" class="">live</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">because of</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">so</st> the <st data-num="2548" class="">one</st> who <st data-num="5176" class="">consumes</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> will <st data-num="2198" class="">live</st> <st data-num="1223">because of</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.
This is the bread that came down from heaven; it is not like the bread your ancestors ate, but then later died. The one who eats this bread will live forever.”
Jesus said these things while he was teaching in the synagogue in Capernaum.

<st data-num="3767" class="">Then</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st>, when they <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> these things,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="3778">This</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> a <st data-num="4642" class="">difficult</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3056" class="">saying</st>!<n id="3" /> <st data-num="5101" class="">Who</st> <st data-num="1410" class="">can</st> <st data-num="191" class="">understand</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>?”<n id="4" />

When <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> was <st data-num="1492" class="">aware</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> were <st data-num="1111" class="">complaining</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st>, he <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “Does <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="4624" class="">cause</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="4624">to be offended</st>?<n id="3" />

<st data-num="3767" class="">Then</st> what <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> you <st data-num="2334" class="">see</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="444" class="">Man</st> <st data-num="305" class="">ascending</st> <st data-num="3699" class="">where</st> he <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="4387">before</st>?<n id="1" />

The <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> <st data-num="5623" class="">is</st> the one who <st data-num="2227">gives life</st>; <st data-num="4561">human nature</st> <st data-num="5623" class="">is</st> of <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="5623" class="">help</st>!<n id="1" /> The <st data-num="4487" class="">words</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> have <st data-num="2980" class="">spoken</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">spirit</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="235" class="">But</st> there <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">some</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">who</st> do <st data-num="3756">not</st> <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st>.” (<st data-num="1063">For</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> had already <st data-num="1492" class="">known</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="746" class="">beginning</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">who</st> those <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> who did <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">who</st> it <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> who would <st data-num="3860" class="">betray</st> <st data-num="846">him</st>.)<n id="1" />
So Jesus added, “Because of this I told you that no one can come to me unless the Father has allowed him to come.”
After this many of his disciples quit following him and did not accompany him any longer.

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to the <st data-num="1427" class="">Twelve</st>, “<st data-num="4771" class="">You</st> <st data-num="3361">don’t</st> <st data-num="2309" class="">want</st> to <st data-num="5217">go away</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">too</st>, do you?”<n id="1" />

<st data-num="4613" class="">Simon</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="2962">Lord</st>, <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">whom</st> would we <st data-num="565" class="">go</st>? You <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> the <st data-num="4487" class="">words</st> of <st data-num="166" class="">eternal</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st>.

<st data-num="1473" class="">We</st><n id="1" /> have come to <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> the <st data-num="40">Holy One</st> of <st data-num="2316">God</st>!”<n id="3" />

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="611" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="3756">Didn’t</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1586" class="">choose</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, the <st data-num="1427" class="">Twelve</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> yet <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="1228" class="">devil</st>?”<n id="2" />
(Now he said this about Judas son of Simon Iscariot, for Judas, one of the Twelve, was going to betray him.)
